cab.content: - y. -ie Property11319SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION ** MORNING ** 16th APRIL. 1918.1. The Germans launched very severe attacks at 6o1clock last night on the front WULVERGHEM - NEUVE-EGLISE '*. BAILLEUL -METEREN and succeeded in capturing BAILLEUL and the RAVELSBERG ridge and pressed our troops back to the line WYTSCHAETE -SPANBROEKMOLEN - LINDENHOEK - DRANOUTRE - St.JANS-CAPPEL (all inclusive to the British) - METEREN (inclusive to the Germans).Among the German divisions who) carried out this attack the Alpine Corps, 117th Division asd 11th Bavarian Division wore identified,2, The Germans attacked WYTSCHAETE this morning under cover of a very heavy mist and the situation there is doubtful.'30 We carried out a successful minor operation near BACQUERELLES Farm and captured some prisoners.4. On the rest of the front there is no change.General staff,.War Office, S.W.I. 16th April, 1918. ..Issued at 11 a,m.
